name: ACQUA FIORENTINA (2012)
description: Imagine the dawn of a summer's day in Tuscany. The sky is purple and gold, heralding the break of another long, lazy day. In the distance, the gentle contours of a hill caressed by the fickle breeze, and on that hill, an orchard, tucked beneath the walls of a thousand-year-old village. The sun rises, and everything is bathed in a shimmering renaissance light; the harbinger of harmony. The earth smiles back, newly touched with beauty.
